nodes.text: A battle took place on the planet Anoth seven standard weeks after the outbreak of the Clone Wars in 22 BBY. Jedi Generals Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker defended Anoth from Separatist forces led by the cyborg General Grievous. Shortly after the battle, Kenobi and Skywalker once again fought Grievous on the planet Bakura.
The battle received a brief mention in The Clone Wars: Wild Space, a novel written by Karen Miller and published in 2008.
